_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Reposilite
author: info@goover.de
description: Lightweight and easy-to-use repository manager for Maven based artifacts in JVM ecosystem. This is simple, extensible and scalable self-hosted solution to replace managers like Nexus, Archiva or Artifactory, with reduced resources consumption.

installation.script:
## Reposile Installscript

cd /mnt/server
echo "Download URL: https://repo.panda-lang.org/releases/org/panda-lang/reposilite/${VERSION}/reposilite-${VERSION}-all.jar"
curl -sSLo reposilite.jar https://repo.panda-lang.org/releases/org/panda-lang/reposilite/${VERSION}/reposilite-${VERSION}-all.jar
echo "Installation done"

variables.name: VERSION
variables.description: Latest download latest stable. For PreReleases use Version
